content: I like the app. But the difference between the android version and the ios version is just unfair. They have way more options than us android users are capable of and for a DnD player that's really unfair. I want to be able to create my character the way I want to and having only few options to choose from is insane. Please come out with an update that's fair and let's us get what they have. And they didn't even have to pay for it we did. Its ridiculous prismscroll. Please do this fairly.

I am glad i didnt pay for this app. I can not share my charater sheets or delet them. I tried to make a druid but found only one cicle was allowed. Very little to work with on the app. I hear this is awesome for ios but if you have a andriod dont get it. Untill it ether updates to allow access to what ios has. Ill be looking for another way to build my charater sheets.

Not much you can do about it but just wish you didn't have to import everything that wasn't on here. (Which is quite a bit) but for not being an official D&D name it does quite well when your playing. ðŸ‘Œ
The app is missing a lot of options (such as dragon marks, backgrounds, druid circles, etc.) but it shows a tonne of promise. I'm super excited to see how it comes along.

It looks good. It's kind of sad you have to pay for this when so much is left out. Only 1 background. I hear this is killer on iOS but the Android version if compared to fight club 5e, or squire pro it's so sad. Hoping the updates make it worth the dollar otherwise it just doesn't stand up to the competition and was a total waste of money. I'm not holding much hope for quick updates, this is absolute garbage. Subraces are non existent, backgrounds still not updated. Highly regret purchase.
So happy that this app is finally on android. Hopefully we can also experience the full features provided in the ios version soon, specially the Journal.
Missing a lot of crucial features and crashes every time I try to use the "custom sheet" option. Wouldn't even be acceptable as freeware
replyContent: Hello Neon, sorry about the trouble you're having. I will look into the custom sheet crashing issue. Thank you for letting me know and wish you luck on finding a product that suits all your needs.

content: Not finished. Missing some common subraces and subclasses. Hopefully it will get better.
replyContent: Hello Shawn, you have the ability to import or create any missing subraces/subclasses you want via the creator, accessible via the character list menu button in the top left. Check out our discord for more instructions!

content: Where's the multi class options? And why the level up system is different??
replyContent: There is unfortunately no multiclassing or level up system in the android version, we hope to revisit those features as we continue to grow

content: Aww man I bought this and I realized the iOS version is way better there's limits with this version
replyContent: still working on it! I hope that you can find another tool to use until we get this up to date

content: The app is cool but definitely not as good as the iOS version. There's no way to export character sheets like on the iOS which I feel is a must have feature. I love the framework but the functionality just isn't there yet. I had an issue with leaving the app and the dials returning to default especially with the backgrounds which affected the skill proficiencies. Apple sucks bring the love to Android.
replyContent: Hello Caleb and thanks for the review! Unfortunately, the Android app is pretty behind the iOS app because of how much later it was released. The current plan is to slowly get it up to speed once we stabilize the iOS versions. Unfortunately my background is in Apple soooo we can agree to disagree haha. Slowly but surely!

content: So far, not happy guys. When will the android version catch up to the iOS version??? My fiancee is always raving about how great this app is but so far this version sucks. It's like the forgotten child of the family. I can't delete a character sheet if I don't need it anymore. I can't even edit things like the graphic if I initially forgot to choose one. There are forced choices for subclasses and such. The editability just isn't up to par with the iOS version Are you going to improve this soon?
replyContent: Hey! I feel your pain. Its probably weird seeing an android app and iOS app not exact copies of each other. Unfortunately, we aren't a large company so we are doing the best we can to slowly improve the Android. You can delete a character by swiping left in the list. You cannot add a character image. You can import other objects from discord

content: this is the best dungeons and dragons character sheet app, if you use it its wise to join their dischord chat to get more help and hints in using the app.
replyContent: Thanks! Its only going to keeping getting better!

content: Updated on 8/17 and now app will not work. Tried to uninstall and reinstall. No luck. Have tried rebooting my phone, the app will still not load. The tip you sent me, fixed the issue. Thank you.
replyContent: You can try to restart your device and also clear the cache for the app. If that doesnâ€™t help, please contact me via social media/discord/sentrydevelopmentco@gmail.com. There might be some corrupted data that the app is processing right when it is trying to open that is causing it to crash immediately

content: could use apple features but overall amazing app
replyContent: slowly but surely! Getting the custom creator is going is really going to help the usefulness

content: Terrible app, no functionality at all. Do Not Buy This is supposed to be a D&D5e character creation utility. virtually no options available. forced choices which make no sense. Example: rogue characters are automatically given acolyte background. there are no subclasses available. Stats are rolled and there's no edit function or ability to use standard array or point buy. I'll be selling a refund
replyContent: Hello Shannon, thanks for taking the time to write a review. So the app is a bit new and we are working to improve on the amount of content available. We understand that it isnâ€™t going to work for everyone in its current state and hope you find a better tool to use in the mean time ðŸ™‚

content: The app is still in its infancy. When it gets fully up and running like its iOS counterpart, this app will storm the D&D digital scene! So good and cant wait for more updates!
replyContent: Thanks for the review! I think getting out the custom character sheet is really gonna help (available in 1.1.0) while we get to work on the custom creator option. Stay tuned and thank you for the review :)

content: great but..... can you add all the races: elf varieties like dark elfs and the evil races
replyContent: Hello David! Thanks for supporting the app! Our next highest priorities are to make a custom sheet that you can input any information to with no restrictions and then to create the custom creator feature which will allow you to create/import any content that you would like (spells/races/etc etc). We are shooting for mid august! Ty for your patience

content: Yes!!! I love using this app. it was unfortunate when i switched from ios and i thought i wouldnt be able to use it anymore. Awesome app guys keep it up!!
replyContent: Thanks for sticking with us! We are super excited for this app to get up to speed and we really like how it looks so far. We are working hard to get the android app up to speed with the ios app so that we can really reach the full potential of the prism apps by making gameplay seamless, giving everyone more time to enjoy the actual game!

content: Awesome app! Definitely worth the buy. Can't wait for more features!
replyContent: Thanks! Super excited for this app to get caught up to the apple platform app! It already looks really great and its only gonna get better
